name: Debapriyo Majumdar
content: Debapriyo Majumdar: Indian Statistical Institute Interests Teaching Debapriyo Majumdar Assistant Professor2014 - now CVPR Unit Indian Statistical Institute 2007-2014 Research Scientist IBM Research IndiaBangalore 2002-2007 Ph.D. in Computer Science Max-Planck-Institute for InformaticsSaarbrucken 2001-2002M.Sc. in Computer Science University of SaarlandSaarbrucken 1998-2001 B.Sc. in Mathematics and Computer Science Chennai Mathematical InstituteChennai 1996-1998Class XI - XII St. Xavier's CollegeKolkata till 1996School Dihibagnan High SchoolHoogly, West Bengal What I (want to) do My goal is to build useful systems and applications involving text search, text analysis, content creation, crowdsourcing and related fields. Publications Here are my publications on DBLP and Google scholar. Teaching Foundations of database systemsPGDBA 1st Year Autumn 2018 Autumn 2017Autumn 2016 Information Retrieval M.Tech.
